# Request for Proposal - Battery Energy Storage System

**Solicitation Details**

| **Field** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | Battery Energy Storage System (SSEB) |
| **Reference Number** | WS4043258937 |
| **Amendment Number** | 7 |
| **Publication Date** | July 6, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | August 21, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | September 5, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | March 29, 2028 |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal (RFP) |
| **Procurement Category** | Goods and Services (G&S) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Cost-per-Point |

**Solicitation Highlights**

* The National Research Council Canada (NRC) requires a Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) to be supplied, delivered, installed, and commissioned at the Energy Mining and Environment Research Centre in Vancouver, British Columbia, by March 29, 2024.
* The BESS is expected to support energy storage applications at the research centre.

**Commercial Considerations**

* The contract will be awarded based on lowest cost-per-point.
* The trade agreements applicable to this solicitation include:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Government Contracting Entity**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**

* Aaron Wong-Sing (he/him)
* aaron.wong-sing@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information**

* Tender description and other related documents are available on Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16797782).
